products.title: Bella Blackout Solar Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout solar yellow 89mm vertical blind in yellow. Made to measure from 14.14 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home!This bright sunny yellow vertical blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This yellow vertical blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out their industry-leading sizesure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse their swifttrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb1269 fabric colour: solar yellow material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Mellow Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout mellow yellow 89mm vertical blind in yellow. Made to measure from 14.14 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This pastel mellow yellow vertical blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms.This vertical blind with accompanying white components and light yellow fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Their vertical blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all their products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart or the yorkshire textile homeland, swift direct blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.
